desc:
This interactive Power BI dashboard offers a comprehensive analysis of Superstore sales data from 2014 to 2017. Designed with a clean and modern layout, it provides key business insights through the following:

✅ KPIs at a glance:

Total Sales: $2.30M

Total Profit: $286.40K

Total Orders: 5009

📅 Time-Based Filters: Select year and month to view sales trends dynamically.

📈 Trend Analysis: Line chart displaying monthly sales trends to monitor growth and seasonality.

💰 Profit by Sub-Category: Visual breakdown to identify top-performing product groups.

🧩 Category Performance: Pie chart showcasing revenue share by product categories like Technology, Furniture, and Office Supplies.

🌍 Region & Segment Filters: Filter data based on business segments (e.g., Consumer, Corporate) and geographical regions.

This dashboard enables stakeholders to make data-driven decisions, optimize product strategies, and identify high-profit segments with ease.

#PowerBI #DataAnalytics #DashboardDesign #SuperstoreDataset #BusinessIntelligence #ProfitAnalysis #SalesDashboard #DataVisualization #DataDriven #AnalyticsPortfolio
title: 📊 Superstore Sales & Profit Dashboard (2014–2017)
